mapper.select: select purchaseId, memberId, purchaseNum, purchasePrice, purchaseMethod, decode(purchaseReceipt, 1,'즉시', 2,'예약') as purchaseReceipt, to_char(purchaseDate,'yy-mm-dd') as purchaseDate, to_char(receiptStartDate,'yy-mm-dd') as receiptStartDate, receiptPeriod, NVL(to_char(healthgoodsId),'-') as healthgoodsId, NVL(to_char(hfid),'-') as hfid, NVL(to_char(nutrientsID),'-') as nutrientsID from purchase where memberid = #{memberid} order by purchaseId
